data.title: Sean Penn and Robin Wright Penn headed for divorce again
data.meta_description: He began rumours after failing to thank his wife in his Oscars speech – now Sean Penn has confirmed that his marriage is over by filing for legal separation from fellow-actor Robin Wright Penn. The
data.text:
He began rumours after failing to thank his wife in his Oscars speech – now Sean Penn has confirmed that his marriage is over by filing for legal separation from fellow-actor Robin Wright Penn.

The Milk star blamed “irreconcilable differences” in papers filed in Marin County, near San Francisco last week.

He is asking the court to waive spousal support. With long film careers behind them, any divorce settlement would involve millions.

Penn, 48, has two Best Actor Oscars, for Milk and Mystic River, and is considered one of the film industry’s biggest talents. His wife, 43, has starred in the world-wide hit Forrest Gump, The Princess Bride, and is currently on cinema screens in State of Play.
